name: Chasca
title: "Skyborne Arbiter" Chasca
desc: Grace and power resound, feathered wings skybound.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Chasca to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Spirit Reins, Shadow Hunt
skills.desc:
Deal ? ? and draw 1 card.
Attach Soulsniper: Ritual Staff to this character, who then enters Nightsoul's Blessing and gains 2 Nightsoul points. (This skill cannot be used after the character enters Nightsoul's Blessing) (Characters with Soulsniper: Ritual Staff attached can use the Technique: Multitarget Fire)
The next 2 times you switch Characters: Draw 1 card.

skills.name: Soul Reaper's Fatal Round
skills.desc: Deals ? ?, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby. Draw 3 cards.

skills.name: Shadowhunt Shell
skills.desc: At the start of each match, add 6 random Shadowhunt Shell to your Deck.
